title: Verb To Be
description: Learn how to use 'am', 'is', and 'are' in sentences and questions.

subtopics.title: Affirmative Forms
subtopics.description: Use the correct form of 'to be' with each subject.

examples.sample: I am a student. You are my teacher.

subtopics.title: Negatives and Questions
subtopics.description: Form the negative and create simple questions using 'to be'.

examples.explanation: Invert verb and subject for questions.

exercises.instruction: Rewrite in the negative form of 'to be'.
